import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import logo from './images/omd_logo.png'; import { FaBars } from 'react-icons/fa'; import Navbar from './navbar'; export default function Header() { const location = useLocation(); console.log(location.pathname); return location.pathname === '/contact' ?
